name: tm62
effect: Teaches Silver Wind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Acrobatics to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Silver Wind)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.
